response.original_title: Yundi Li 14th International Frederick Chopin Piano Competition
response.overview: At age 18, Yundi Li (aka Yundi) plays the performance that won him the 14th International Frederick Chopin Piano Competition in October 2000, launching him to international fame as a concert pianist. The performance is played at the Warsaw Philharmonic Hall in Warsaw, Poland.  During this performance, Yundi Li plays the following pieces:  - Scherzo no.2 op.31 by Frédéric Chopin  - Andante Spianato and Grande Polonaise Brillante op.22 by Frédéric Chopin  - Piano Concerto No.1 in E Minor by Frédéric Chopin, with the Warsaw Philharmonic Orchestra (conducted by Kazimierz Kord)
response.title: Yundi Li 14th International Frederick Chopin Piano Competition
